name: APHRC Microdata Portal
description: APHRC's web-based platform publishes metadata, documentation, and shares qualitative and quantitative datasets from research studies by the Center. Datasets are freely available to partners, researchers, academicians, and post-graduate students for research and thesis-related works in formats like Stata and SPSS. The portal provides a data request process with login and approval mechanisms.
owner_name: African Population and Health Research Center (APHRC)
